action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
▢ X X X X
▢ X X X X
▢ X X X X
▢ X X X X
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
DESCRIPTION: A 5x5 grid where the top-right 4x4 section is filled with X symbols. The leftmost column and bottom row contain empty squares, forming an inverted "L" shape.

DESCRIPTION: My grid is 5x5. The top row is all filled with X's. The second row has X's in positions 2, 3, and 4, with empty squares in positions 1 and 5. The third row has an empty square in position 1 and X's in positions 2-5. The fourth row has an empty square in position 1 and X's in positions 2-5. The bottom row is entirely empty squares.

This is my DESCRIPTION: A 5x5 grid where the top-right 4x4 section is filled with X symbols. The leftmost column and bottom row contain empty squares, forming an inverted "L" shape.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my grid that may be different to your grid. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Does your top row contain any X symbols in the leftmost position (top-left corner)?

The third row has an empty square in position 1 and X's in positions 2-5. The fourth row has an empty square in position 1 and X's in positions 2-5. The bottom row is entirely empty squares.
